alert.note: Alert for Northampton (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 07 at 10:14PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of north central Northampton, southeastern Greensville and southwestern Southampton Counties and the City of Emporia through 1100 PM EDT... At 1014 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Green Plain to near Claresville to near Seaboard. Movement was east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and very heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Emporia, Garysburg, Dahlia, Seaboard, Claresville, Green Plain, Jackson, Adams Grove, Lanes Corner, Bryants Corner, Pleasant Grove, Pleasant Hill, Margarettsville, Gumberry, Little Texas and Emporia Airport. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...45 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
